KnowWE-core

Contains javascript functions the KnowWE core needs to functions properly.  The functions are based upon some KnowWE helper functions and need the KNOWWE-helper.js in order to work correct.

Summary
KnowWE-coreContains javascript functions the KnowWE core needs to functions properly.
KNOWWE.coreThe KNOWWE core namespace.
Functions
initCore init functions.
KNOWWE.core.actionsThe KNOWWE actions namespace object.
Functions
initCore KnowWE actions.
clearHTMLClears the inner HTML of a given element.
cellChanged
enableQuickEditSets the quick-edit flag to the given element.
KNOWWE.core.utilThe KNOWWE core util namespace object.
Functions
addCollabsiblePluginHeaderExtends the headings of the KnowWEPlugin DIVs with collabs ability.
getURLReturns an URL created out of the given parameters.
getWindowParamsReturns an URL which is used as the target URL for a popup window.
replaceUsed to replace elements in the DOM tree.
KNOWWE.core.util.formSome helper functions concerning HTML form elements.
Functions
getCursorPositionInTextAreaDoes get the current position of the cursor inside a textarea.
insertAtCursorInserts an text element at the current cursor position in a textarea, etc.
addFormHintsShows a small overlay text containing additional information about an input HTMLElement.
showExtendedPanelShows a panel in certain plugin with additional options.
KNOWWE.core.util.tablesorterThe KNOWWE table sorter namespace.
Functions
initInitializes the sort ability.
sortSorts the table according to the selected column.
KNOWWE.core.tableThe KNOWWE table tag namespace.
Functions
initInitializes some table functionality.
mapReturns the map of the KnowWETable.
onChangeTriggered when the cell content changes.
onSaveTriggered when the changes to the table in edit mode should be saved.
KNOWWE.core.renamingThe KNOWWE renaming tool plugin object.
Functions
selectPerSelectionSelect all checkboxes within a certain section.
deselectPerSelectionDeselects all chechboxes in the renaming form.
previewSends an request with the entered values and shows the result of the renaming request in a preview table.
replaceReplace action.
getAdditionalMatchTextGet additional context in which the string occurs.
getColumnsReturns the columns used in the renaming result table.
KNOWWE.core.typebrowserThe KNOWWE typebrowser namespace.
Functions
initThe typebrowser init function.
getAdditionalMatchTextTypeBrowserGets additional context around the typebrowser finding.
switchTypeActivationSwitches the status of the selected type.
searchTypesSearches for selected type and returns the result that can be viewed in the Wiki page.
KNOWWE.core.codecompletitionThe KNOWWE code completion tool namespace.
Functions
initInitializes the code completion functionality.
handleKeyEventTriggers the codecomplition action after the user pressed STRG + Space.
KNOWWE.pluginThe KNOWWE plugin namespace.

KNOWWE.core

The KNOWWE core namespace.  Contains some init functions.

Summary
Functions
initCore init functions.

Functions

init

init : function()

Core init functions.

KNOWWE.core.actions

The KNOWWE actions namespace object.  Contains all actions that can be triggered in KnowWE per javascript.

Summary
Functions
initCore KnowWE actions.
clearHTMLClears the inner HTML of a given element.
cellChanged
enableQuickEditSets the quick-edit flag to the given element.

Functions

init

init : function()

Core KnowWE actions.

clearHTML

clearHTML : function(e)

Clears the inner HTML of a given element.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

cellChanged

cellChanged : function(e)

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

enableQuickEdit

enableQuickEdit : function(fn,
id)

Sets the quick-edit flag to the given element.

Parameters

fnThe function that should be executed afterwards.
idThe id of the element the quick edit flag should set to.

KNOWWE.core.util

The KNOWWE core util namespace object.  Contains some helper functions.  For detailed information read the comments above each function.

Summary
Functions
addCollabsiblePluginHeaderExtends the headings of the KnowWEPlugin DIVs with collabs ability.
getURLReturns an URL created out of the given parameters.
getWindowParamsReturns an URL which is used as the target URL for a popup window.
replaceUsed to replace elements in the DOM tree.

Functions

addCollabsiblePluginHeader

addCollabsiblePluginHeader : function(id)

Extends the headings of the KnowWEPlugin DIVs with collabs ability.  The function searches for all DIVs with an “.panel” class attribute and extends them.  The plugin DIV should have the following structure in order to work properly:

<div class='panel'><h3>Pluginname</h3><x>some plugin content</x></div>

getURL

getURL : function(params)

Returns an URL created out of the given parameters. e.g.:

 var params = {
     renderer : 'KWiki_dpsSolutions',
     KWikiWeb : 'default_web'
 }
KNOWWE.util.getURL( params ) --> KnowWE.jsp?renderer=KWiki_dpsSolutions&KWikiWeb=default_web

Parameters

paramsThe parameter for the URL.

Returns

The URL containing the elements of the params array.

getWindowParams

getWindowParams : function(params)

Returns an URL which is used as the target URL for a popup window.

Parameters

paramsThe parameter for the popup window Returns: The url for the popup window

replace

replace : function(ids,
value)

Used to replace elements in the DOM tree.  All elements given in the ids array are replaced with the value of the second parameter.  If one element is not found, nothing happens.

Parameters

idsThe ids of the elements that should be replaced.
valueThe value used for replacement.

KNOWWE.core.util.form

Some helper functions concerning HTML form elements.

Summary
Functions
getCursorPositionInTextAreaDoes get the current position of the cursor inside a textarea.
insertAtCursorInserts an text element at the current cursor position in a textarea, etc.
addFormHintsShows a small overlay text containing additional information about an input HTMLElement.
showExtendedPanelShows a panel in certain plugin with additional options.

Functions

getCursorPositionInTextArea

getCursorPositionInTextArea : function(textarea)

Does get the current position of the cursor inside a textarea.

Parameters

textareaThe textarea

Returns

The position of the cursor inside the textarea.

insertAtCursor

insertAtCursor : function(element,
value)

Inserts an text element at the current cursor position in a textarea, etc.

Parameters

elementThe textarea, etc.
valueThe text string

addFormHints

addFormHints : function(name)

Shows a small overlay text containing additional information about an input HTMLElement.  Used for e.g. in the KnofficeUploader.

Parameters

nameThe name of the HTMLElement

showExtendedPanel

showExtendedPanel : function()

Shows a panel in certain plugin with additional options.

KNOWWE.core.util.tablesorter

The KNOWWE table sorter namespace.  Contains functions to sort HTMLTables.

Summary
Functions
initInitializes the sort ability.
sortSorts the table according to the selected column.

Functions

init

init : function(columns,
tableID)

Initializes the sort ability.

Parameters

columnsThe columns of the to sort table.
tableIDThe id of the table.

sort

sort : function(columnID,
tableID)

Sorts the table according to the selected column.

Parameters

columnsThe columns of the to sort table.
tableIDThe id of the table.

KNOWWE.core.table

The KNOWWE table tag namespace.

Summary
Functions
initInitializes some table functionality.
mapReturns the map of the KnowWETable.
onChangeTriggered when the cell content changes.
onSaveTriggered when the changes to the table in edit mode should be saved.

Functions

init

init : function()

Initializes some table functionality.

map

Returns the map of the KnowWETable.  Stores the changed cells in edit mode.

Returns

The changed cells stored as map.

onChange

onChange : function(e)

Triggered when the cell content changes.  Stores the new value together with the old one in the table map.

Parameters

eThe occurred cell change event.

onSave

onSave : function(e)

Triggered when the changes to the table in edit mode should be saved.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

KNOWWE.core.renaming

The KNOWWE renaming tool plugin object.

Summary
Functions
selectPerSelectionSelect all checkboxes within a certain section.
deselectPerSelectionDeselects all chechboxes in the renaming form.
previewSends an request with the entered values and shows the result of the renaming request in a preview table.
replaceReplace action.
getAdditionalMatchTextGet additional context in which the string occurs.
getColumnsReturns the columns used in the renaming result table.

Functions

selectPerSelection

Select all checkboxes within a certain section.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

deselectPerSelection

Deselects all chechboxes in the renaming form.

Parameters

eThe occurred event.

preview

preview : function()

Sends an request with the entered values and shows the result of the renaming request in a preview table.

replace

replace : function()

Replace action.  Replaces the given string in all the selceted articles.

getAdditionalMatchText

getAdditionalMatchText : function(event)

Get additional context in which the string occurs.  This text is shown in the match column of the renaming tool.

Parameters

atmUrlA string containing information which context to expand.

getColumns

getColumns : function()

Returns the columns used in the renaming result table.

Returns

The columns used in the renaming result table.

KNOWWE.core.typebrowser

The KNOWWE typebrowser namespace.

Summary
Functions
initThe typebrowser init function.
getAdditionalMatchTextTypeBrowserGets additional context around the typebrowser finding.
switchTypeActivationSwitches the status of the selected type.
searchTypesSearches for selected type and returns the result that can be viewed in the Wiki page.

Functions

init

init : function()

The typebrowser init function.  Enables the typebrowser and type activator buttons.

getAdditionalMatchTextTypeBrowser

getAdditionalMatchTextTypeBrowser : function(event)

Gets additional context around the typebrowser finding.  Used to view the context in which the type occurs.

Parameters

atmUrlAn special URL.  Used o transport the position of the finding and how many context elements should be displayed.
queryThe query string for the TypeBrowser action

switchTypeActivation

switchTypeActivation : function()

Switches the status of the selected type.  It either enables or disables one type.

searchTypes

searchTypes : function()

Searches for selected type and returns the result that can be viewed in the Wiki page.

KNOWWE.core.codecompletition

The KNOWWE code completion tool namespace.  Do not use!  Will be replaced soon :)

Summary
Functions
initInitializes the code completion functionality.
handleKeyEventTriggers the codecomplition action after the user pressed STRG + Space.

Functions

init

init : function()

Initializes the code completion functionality.  Enables the keydown handler in the editor and insert the auto complete button.

handleKeyEvent

handleKeyEvent : function(event)

Triggers the codecomplition action after the user pressed STRG + Space.

Parameters

eventThe triggered event

KNOWWE.plugin

The KNOWWE plugin namespace.  Initialized empty to ensure existence.
